thread.title: Sigourney Weaver set for role in all-female Ghostbusters | DailyTelegraph
thread.title_full: Sigourney Weaver set for role in all-female Ghostbusters | DailyTelegraph

author: Network writers
title: Sigourney Weaver set for role in all-female Ghostbusters | DailyTelegraph
text:
SIGOURNEY Weaver, who starred in the original Ghostbusters, will appear in the hotly anticipated all-female reboot.
Director Paul Feig tweeted fans after he said the news was about to leak.
Gang, trying to keep surprises but this is about to leak, so I'll tell you myself: the awesome Sigourney Weaver is going to be in our movie!
— Paul Feig (@paulfeig) September 25, 2015 What’s not known is whether Weaver will reprise her role of Dana Barrett.
Other Stories Should Jesinta and Buddy postpone? Sydney Confidential 0 comments Paedophile’s car seized in Tyrrell case Nsw King Mal wins in The Game of Homes Nsw 0 comments Tony and me: Abbott on life after PM Nsw 0 comments Roosters rolled by brilliant Broncos Nrl 0 comments Heather Maltman recaps The Bachelorette Rendezview 0 comments The new movie has faced online criticism from some fans after it was announced it would star a team of all-female Ghostbusters made up of Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Leslie Jones and Kate McKinnon.
@paulfeig Best news ever? Probably. pic.twitter.com/1DQmQU0unS
— Ian Cummins (@TheGreatHumbug) September 25, 2015 Men only ... Dan Aykroyd, Bill Murray and Harold Ramis in the original Ghostbusters. Picture: Supplied McCarthy and Wiig teamed up with Feig for 2011 comedy Bridesmaids . Along with Saturday Night Live stars Jones and McKinnon the quartet will take on the iconic roles played by Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis and Ernie Hudson in the 1984 original.
Weaver is the latest member of the original cast to join the new movie after it was announced that Hudson, Murray and Aykroyd would also make cameos.
The film is set for release next summer.
Returning ... Actor Sigourney Weaver will make a cameo in the new movie. Picture: Neilson Barnard/Getty Images Ghostbusters - Official Trailer Originally published as Weaver to star in new Ghostbusters
